```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(caret)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
data(diamonds)
final_dat = diamonds %>%
  select(-x, -y, -z) %>%
  mutate(price = if_else(price < 5000, "low", if_else(price > 10000, "high", "medium"))) %>%
  mutate(id = row_number())
head(final_dat)
```
